channel.title: CVE Feed for baden03 -- jQuery T(-) Countdown Widget
channel.description: The latest CVEs for baden03 -- jQuery T(-) Countdown Widget

item.title: CVE-2024-4783|2024-05-23T01:56:18.773Z -- baden03 -- jQuery T(-) Countdown Widget
item.description: The jQuery T(-) Countdown Widget plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's tminus shortcode in all versions up to, and including, 2.3.25 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
